text:
Sri Sri Sri Shivakumara Swamigalu (1 April 1907 – 21 January 2019) better known as Shivakumara Swami, was a Hindu religious figure and humanitarian. He was the head of Sree Siddaganga Matha who provided education to many people. in Tumkur District, Karnataka, South India and founder of the Sri Siddaganga Education Society.
In 2015 the Government of India awarded him the Padma Bhushan. He became a supercentenarian on 1 April 2017.
Swami died on 21 January 2019 in Tumkur, Karnataka from a lung infection at the age of 111.
